setname.name: setname
setname.description: Allows you to change the name of the bot

setpic.name: setpic
setpic.description: Allows you to change the avatat of the bot

prefix.name: prefix
prefix.description: Allows you to change the prefix on the server

help.name: help
help.description: Show command help or help for a particular command

antiraid.name: antiraid
antiraid.description: Allows you to configure or view the anti-nuke configuration
antiraid.example:
!antiraid config
!antiraid punition kick
!antiraid antiban max
!antiraid on
!antiraid logs #channel
antiraid.perms: Creator of the server or owner of the bot on the server

add.name: add
add.description: Gives the bot invitation link as well as that of the support server

owner.name: owner
owner.description: Allows you to manage owner users on the server

whitelist.name: whitelist
whitelist.description: Allows you to manage users in the whitelist on the server
whitelist.perms: Creator of the server or owner of the bot on the server

speed.name: speed
speed.description: Gives the bot's ping and latency in ms

lang.name: lang
lang.description: Change the bot language on your server

invitebot: Invite the bot to your own server!

botNoPerms: I don't have permission to do this command!
tag: the prefix on this server is
permowner: Only the creator of the server can do this command!
permowners: Only creators of the server can do this command!

crealogs: was **kicked** for `joining with an account created too recently`

varia:
`on・Allows to activate a module`
`off・Allows to deactivate a module`
`max・Allows to activate a module even for whitelist users`

ownerclear2: no one has been deleted from the owners!
wlclear1: people have been removed from the whitelist!
wlclear2: no one was deleted from the whitelist!
removewl: is no longer in the whitelist!
max: is now enabled even for users in the whitelist

linkmsg: you do not have permission to send links here

pingmsg: you don't have permission to mention everyone

antilinivt: The antilink already detected only the invitations
antilinkiv: The antilink will only detect invitations
